messages.content:
<your_role>
Research current facts and figures for content
</your_role>

<instructions>
Fetch real-time data as of March 31, 2025, related to 'desk organization tips' for an SEO-optimized blog. Include:
1. The latest statistics or facts from credible web sources (e.g., travel reports, news articles, industry blogs).
2. Trending discussions or insights from X posts, YouTube videos/comments, Reddit threads, Hacker News posts, and other relevant social platforms (e.g., hashtags, sentiments, key topics).
3. A concise summary linking the data to the keyword and suggesting how it can enhance SEO relevance.
If a content gap analysis is provided below, incorporate it to identify unique angles or underserved topics competitors may have missed. 

---BEGIN GAP ANALYSIS---
**  
1. **Mental Health & Workspace Psychology** – Most content focuses on physical organization but neglects how clutter impacts stress, focus, and cognitive load.  
2. **Hybrid Work Adaptations** – Few guides address dynamic setups for those alternating between home and office workspaces.  
3. **Sustainable & Budget-Friendly Solutions** – Overlooked DIY hacks, upcycling, and eco-conscious storage alternatives.
---END GAP ANALYSIS---
Return the response in JSON format with fields: 'stats' (list of facts with sources and dates), 'social_insights' (list of trends with platform, sentiment, and examples), and 'summary' (text tying it to the keyword and SEO goals).

Keep your response concise, with 3-5 stats and 2-3 social insights at most.
</instructions>

Fetch real-time data as of March 31, 2025, related to 'desk organization tips' for an SEO-optimized blog. Include:

---END GAP ANALYSIS---

But as most people know, keeping a work-from-home station ...", "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-us/money/human-resources/48-desk-organization-ideas-to-make-your-wfh-setup-work-for-you/ar-AA1pguU1", "image": "", "source": "MSN" }, { "date": "2025-03-25T05:57:00+00:00", "title": "Office Overhaul: 4 Tips for Refreshing Your Workspace", "body": "A workspace shapes productivity, professionalism, and focus. A cluttered office reduces motivation, while an organized space boosts efficiency. Strategic upgrades can transform an ordinary office into a hub of creativity and innovation.", "url": "https://techbullion.com/office-overhaul-4-tips-for-refreshing-your-workspace/", "image": "https://techbullion.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/toa-heftiba-FV3GConVSss-unsplash-1000x600.jpg", "source": "TechBullion" }, { "date": "2025-03-17T00:00:00+00:00", "title": "FREE Desk Organization Ideas!", "body": "MORE ON MY BLOG: http://www.doitonadimeblog.com/2015/01/free-desk-organization/ MORE IN ...", "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-us/money/personalfinance/free-desk-organization-ideas/vi-AA1B6iaE", "image": "", "source": "MSN" }, { "date": "2025-03-30T12:49:56+00:00", "title": "DIY Home Office Upgrades: Budget Tips for Maximum Impact", "body": "Transform your workspace with budget-friendly DIY upgrades that maximize style and functionality. Discover tips for a productive home office makeover!", "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-us/home-and-garden/home-improvement/diy-home-office-upgrades-budget-tips-for-maximum-impact/ar-AA1BWk3s", "image": "https://img-s-msn-com.akamaized.net/tenant/amp/entityid/AA1BWoZg.img?w=1024&h=1024&m=4&q=100", "source": "The Mind of Griff" } ]
